short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make your talent acquisition flow with ZooKeep

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
・Source candidates faster by importing them directly to your ZooKeep application.
・Check if candidates already exist in your ATS and avoid creating duplicates.
・Streamline your talent acquisition productivity to spend more time on work that matters.
---
⚠ You need a ZooKeep account to use the ZooKeep Chrome Extension. Learn more here: https://zookeep.com/
